title: GUARANTEE YOUR STUDENTS INTERNSHIPS
subtitle: Be an institution which degrees truly lead to employment!
description: We have built up a powerful network of partner companies and organizations, pooling their efforts to ensure that their internships and first jobs are widely advertised to students and to prepare graduates for the world of work.

benefits.heading: Benefits from  partnering with  LAURATA
items: Receive internship and job alerts for your students and graduates
Get your students and graduates trained in job search techniques
Your graduates will be invited to our job or employment events
